Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
astronaut \as"tro*naut\ adj. a person trained to travel in a spacecraft; one who travels in a spacecraft; -- called in the Soviet Union and Russia {cosmonaut}.
Syn: spaceman, cosmonaut [WordNet 1.5]
astronaut n : a person trained to travel in a spacecraft; "the Russians called their astronauts cosmonauts" [syn: {spaceman}, {cosmonaut}]
